original_text: And there shall be an hole in the top of it, in the midst thereof: it shall have a binding of woven work round about the hole of it, as it were the hole of an habergeon, that it be not rent.
korean_text: 두 어깨 사이에 머리 들어갈 구멍을 내고 그 주위에 갑옷 깃 같이 깃을 짜서 찢어지지 않게 하고

sentences.original_text: And there shall be an hole in the top of it
it shall have a binding of woven work
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 짜서 만든 작업으로 된 가장자리를 가질 것이라

sentences.original_text: round about the hole of it
as it were the hole of an habergeon
